original_text: Joseph said to the people, “Now that I have bought you and your land today for Pharaoh, here is seed for you so you can plant the ground.
korean_text: 요셉이 백성에게 이르되 오늘 내가 바로를 위하여 너희 몸과 너희 토지를 샀노라 여기 종자가 있으니 너희는 그 땅에 뿌리라

sentences.original_text: Now that I have bought you and your land
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 너의 땅을 샀기 때문에

sentences.original_text: so you can plant the ground
